Title: Joy to the World
Plot: House and his team deal with a bullied girl who collapses during her school's Christmas program. Meanwhile, Foreman and Thirteen grow closer during the Huntington's disease drug trials, House gives a patient a gift, the staff wonder who gave House a special gift, and Cuddy gets an unexpected gift.
GuestStars: Marissa Ingrasci, Christopher Demaci, Alix Korey, Ben Shields, Taylor Dooley, Meaghan Jette Martin, Bitsie Tulloch, Phyllis Lyons, Lucas Till, Sherilyn Fenn, Michael Leydon Campbell, B.K. Cannon, Lori Petty, John
